biotools.summary: Curtain is a Java wrapper around next-generation assemblers such as Velvet which allows the incremental introduction of read-pair information into the assembly process. This enables the assembly of larger genomes than would otherwise be possible within existing memory constraints.

bioschemas.name: Curtain
